data.name: bb
data.value: bb

data.name: Database
data.value: ..\Connection\database.db;System.Byte[], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

data.name: DbFileName
data.value: database.db

data.name: DbPath
data.value: Logic.BD\Connection\

data.name: SQL_DELETE_ATHLETE
data.value: DELETE FROM Athlete WHERE ATHLETE_DNI=@DNI

data.name: SQL_INSERT_ATHLETE
data.value: INSERT INTO Athlete VALUES(@DNI, @NAME, @SURNAME, @BIRTH_DATE, @GENDER)
data.comment: sql command for insert values into table Athletes

data.name: SQL_INSERT_COMPETITION
data.value: insert into Competition values(null, @COMPETITION_NAME, @COMPETITION_TYPE,@COMPETITION_KM, @COMPETITION_DATE,@COMPETITION_NUMBER_PLACES ,@COMPETITION_STATUS,@COMPETITION_RULES,@COMPETITION_SLOPE, @COMPETITION_MILESTONES, @COMPETITION_PREINSCRIPTION, @COMPETITION_DAYS_PREINSCRIPTION)

data.name: SQL_SELECT_ATHLETE
data.value: SELECT ATHLETE_DNI, ATHLETE_NAME, ATHLETE_SURNAME, ATHLETE_BIRTH_DATE, ATHLETE_GENDER FROM Athlete

data.name: SQL_SELECT_ATHLETES_TIMES
data.value: SELECT DORSAL, ATHLETE_DNI, ATHLETE_NAME, ATHLETE_SURNAME, ATHLETE_GENDER, INITIAL_TIME, FINISH_TIME, age FROM HasParticipated NATURAL JOIN Enroll NATURAL JOIN Athlete NATURAL JOIN GET_AGE_NOW WHERE COMPETITION_ID=@COMPETITION_ID AND ATHLETE_DNI=GET_AGE_NOW.ATHLETE_DNI

data.name: SQL_SELECT_COMPETITION
data.value: SELECT * FROM Competition

data.name: SQL_SELECT_COMPETITION_STATUS
data.value: SELECT COMPETITION_ID, COMPETITION_NAME, COMPETITION_TYPE, COMPETITION_KM, COMPETITION_DATE, COMPETITION_STATUS, count(*) as INSCRITOS FROM Competition natural join Enroll WHERE COMPETITION_STATUS=@STATUS group by COMPETITION_ID

data.name: SQL_INSERT_HAS_PARTICIPATED
data.value: INSERT INTO HasParticipated(COMPETITION_ID, ATHLETE_DNI) select COMPETITION_ID, ATHLETE_DNI from Enroll where status=@STATUS

data.name: SQL_SELECT_ATHLETES_STATUS
data.value: SELECT * FROM ENROLL WHERE STATUS = @STATUS AND COMPETITION_ID=@COMPETITION_ID ORDER BY DATE_INSCRIPTION

data.name: SQL_SELECT_ATHLETE_INSCRIPTION
data.value: SELECT * FROM ENROLL WHERE COMPETITION_ID=@COMPETITION_ID ORDER BY DATE_INSCRIPTION, STATUS

data.name: SQL_UPDATE_DORSAL
data.value: update Enroll set dorsal=@DORSAL where COMPETITION_ID=@COMPETITION_ID and ATHLETE_DNI=@DNI and dorsal is null

data.name: SQL_INSERT_ENROLL
data.value: insert into enroll values (@DNI, @COMPETITION_ID, @STATUS, date('now'), null)

data.name: SQL_SELECT_CATEGORY_IN_COMPETITION
data.value: select CATEGORY_NAME FROM GET_CATEGORY_COMPETITION where athlete_dni =@DNI and COMPETITION_ID=@COMPETITION_ID

data.name: SQL_SELECT_COMPETITION_CATEGORY
data.value: select category_name from get_category_competition where competition_id=@COMPETITION_ID

data.name: SQL_SELECT_OPEN_COMPETITION
data.value: select COMPETITION_ID, COMPETITION_NAME, COMPETITION_TYPE, COMPETITION_KM, COMPETITION_PRICE, INITIAL_DATE, FINISH_DATE, COMPETITION_DATE, COMPETITION_RULES from Competition natural join CompetitionDates natural join DateInscription where (date('now') between INITIAL_DATE and FINISH_DATE) and Competition.COMPETITION_STATUS='OPEN'

data.name: SQL_SELECT_COMPETITION_FINISH_LIST
data.value: select COMPETITION_ID, COMPETITION_NAME, COMPETITION_TYPE, COMPETITION_KM, COMPETITION_PRICE, INITIAL_DATE, FINISH_DATE, COMPETITION_DATE from Competition natural join CompetitionDates natural join DateInscription where date('now') not BETWEEN INITIAL_DATE and FINISH_DATE and date('now') < COMPETITION_DATE

data.name: SQL_COUNT_ATHLETE_BY_DNI
data.value: SELECT count(*) FROM Athlete WHERE ATHLETE_DNI=@DNI

data.name: SQL_SELECT_COMPETITION_TO_INSCRIBE
data.value: select COMPETITION_ID, COMPETITION_NAME, COMPETITION_TYPE, COMPETITION_KM, COMPETITION_PRICE, INITIAL_DATE, FINISH_DATE, COMPETITION_DATE from Competition natural join CompetitionDates natural join DateInscription where date('now') BETWEEN INITIAL_DATE and FINISH_DATE and COMPETITION_STATUS<>'FINISH' and COMPETITION_NUMBER_PLACES > (select count(*) from enroll group by competition_id) AND COMPETITION_ID not in (SELECT COMPETITION_ID FROM ENROLL WHERE ATHLETE_DNI=@DNI)

data.name: SQL_SELECT_COMPETITION_BY_ID
data.value: select COMPETITION_ID, COMPETITION_NAME, COMPETITION_TYPE, COMPETITION_KM, COMPETITION_PRICE, COMPETITION_DATE, COMPETITION_RULES, COMPETITION_STATUS, COMPETITION_NUMBER_MILESTONE, COMPETITION_SLOPE from Competition natural join CompetitionDates natural join DateInscription where COMPETITION_ID=@ID

data.name: SQL_SELECT_MAX_DORSAL
data.value: select max(dorsal) from enroll where COMPETITION_ID=@COMPETITION_ID

data.name: SQL_SELECT_ALL_COMPETITIONS
data.value: select * from Competition

data.name: SQL_SELECT_ATHLETE_BY_DNI
data.value: SELECT distinct Athlete.ATHLETE_DNI, Athlete.ATHLETE_NAME, Athlete.ATHLETE_SURNAME, Competition.Competition_name, Athlete.ATHLETE_GENDER FROM Athlete, hasParticipated, competition, enroll where Athlete.ATHLETE_DNI = @DNI and enroll.athlete_dni =@DNI and hasparticipated.competition_id = competition.competition_id

data.name: SQL_SELECT_ALL_COMP_INSCRIPTED
data.value: Select Competition.COMPETITION_NAME, Enroll.STATUS, Enroll.DATE_INSCRIPTION, Enroll.DORSAL from Enroll, Competition where Athlete_dni = @DNI and Competition.COMPETITION_ID = Enroll.COMPETITION_ID

data.name: SQL_SELECT_COMPETITIONS_PARTICIPATED
data.value: select HasParticipated.FINISH_TIME, Competition.COMPETITION_NAME, Athlete.athlete_gender from Competition, hasparticipated, athlete where Competition.COMPETITION_ID= hasparticipated.COMPETITION_ID and hasparticipated.athlete_dni = @DNI and athlete.athlete_dni = @DNI

data.name: SQL_SELECT_COUNT_DORSALS_BY_COMPETITION
data.value: select COUNT(*) from Competition natural join Enroll where COMPETITION_ID = @COMPETITION_ID AND DORSAL IS NOT NULL

data.name: SQL_SELECT_CATEGORY_BY_COMPETITION
data.value: select ABSOLUT_CATEGORY_ID, NAME, ID_M, ID_F FROM AbsolutCategories, CompetitionCategory where CompetitionCategory.COMPETITION_ID = @COMPETITION_ID AND CompetitionCategory.ABSOLUT_CATEGORY_ID = AbsolutCategories.ID

data.name: SQL_SELECT_ATHLETES_TIMES_BY_CATEGORY
data.value: SELECT DORSAL, ATHLETE_DNI, ATHLETE_NAME, ATHLETE_SURNAME, ATHLETE_GENDER, INITIAL_TIME, FINISH_TIME FROM HasParticipated NATURAL JOIN Enroll NATURAL JOIN Athlete NATURAL JOIN CompetitionCategory NATURAL JOIN Category WHERE COMPETITION_ID=@COMPETITION_ID AND CATEGORY_MIN_AGE <= @AGE AND @AGE >= CATEGORY_MAX_AGE AND ((ATHLETE_GENDER = @GENDER AND CATEGORY_GENDER = @GENDER) OR CATEGORY_GENDER IS NULL)

data.name: SQL_SELECT_ATHLETES_TIMES_BY_GENDER
data.value: SELECT DORSAL, ATHLETE_DNI, ATHLETE_NAME, ATHLETE_SURNAME, ATHLETE_GENDER, INITIAL_TIME, FINISH_TIME, age FROM HasParticipated NATURAL JOIN Enroll NATURAL JOIN Athlete NATURAL JOIN GET_AGE_NOW WHERE COMPETITION_ID=@COMPETITION_ID AND ATHLETE_DNI=GET_AGE_NOW.ATHLETE_DNI AND ((AGE >= @CATEGORY_MIN_AGE_M AND AGE <= @CATEGORY_MAX_AGE_M) OR (AGE >= @CATEGORY_MIN_AGE_F AND AGE <= @CATEGORY_MAX_AGE_F))

data.name: SQL_SELECT_CATEGORIES
data.value: SELECT * FROM Category WHERE CATEGORY_ID = @ID

data.name: SQL_SELECT_OUTSTANDING
data.value: select ATHLETE_DNI, COMPETITION_ID, COMPETITION_PRICE, DATE_INSCRIPTION from Enroll natural join Competition natural join CompetitionDates natural join DateInscription where status='OUTSTANDING' and date_inscription between initial_date and finish_date

data.name: SQL_UPDATE_INSCRIPTION_STATUS
data.value: update Enroll set status=@STATUS where competition_id=@COMPETITION_ID and athlete_dni=@DNI

data.name: SQL_GET_RULES
data.value: select competition_rules from competition where competition_id=@COMPETITION_ID

data.name: DefaultCategories
data.value: ..\Resources\DefaultCategories.json;System.Byte[], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

data.name: SQL_SELECT_PARTIAL_TIMES
data.value: select ATHLETE_DNI, NUMBER_MILESTONE, TIME from HasParticipated natural join TimesCompetition where ATHLETE_DNI = @DNI and COMPETITION_ID = @COMPETITION_ID

data.name: SQL_SELECT_ATHLETES_HAS_PARTICIPATED
data.value: select ATHLETE_DNI, ATHLETE_NAME, ATHLETE_SURNAME, ATHLETE_BIRTH_DATE, ATHLETE_GENDER from Athlete natural join HasParticipated where COMPETITION_ID = @COMPETITION_ID

data.name: SQL_SELECT_CATEGORY_BY_COMP_AND_ATHLETE
data.value: select Category_id, Category_name, CATEGORY_MIN_AGE, CATEGORY_MAX_AGE, GENDER from GET_CATEGORY_COMPETITION natural join Category where ATHLETE_DNI = @DNI AND COMPETITION_ID = @COMPETITION_ID

data.name: SQL_SELECT_HAS_PARTICIPATED
data.value: select COMPETITION_ID, ATHLETE_DNI, INITIAL_TIME, FINISH_TIME from HasParticipated where COMPETITION_ID=@COMPETITION_ID AND ATHLETE_DNI=@DNI

data.name: SQL_SELECT_DNI_FROM_DORSAL
data.value: select * from Enroll where dorsal = @DORSAL AND COMPETITION_ID = @COMPETITION_ID

data.name: SQL_INSERT_PARTIAL_TIMES
data.value: insert into TimesCompetition values (@COMPETITION_ID, @DNI, @MILESTONE, @TIME)

data.name: SQL_UPDATE_PARTIAL_TIMES
data.value: UPDATE TimesCompetition SET TIME=@TIME WHERE COMPETITION_ID = @COMPETITION_ID AND ATHLETE_DNI = @DNI AND NUMBER_MILESTONE = @MILESTONE

data.name: SQL_SELECT_NOT_CANCELED_INSCRIPTIONS
data.value: select competition_id, competition_name, status, date_inscription, refund, date_refund from enroll natural join competition natural join competitionrefund C where athlete_dni=@DNI and status<>'CANCELED' and date_refund in (select min(date_refund) from competitionrefund where Date('now') < date_refund and C.COMPETITION_ID=COMPETITION_ID group by competition_id)

data.name: SQL_SELECT_COMPETITION_PRICE
data.value: select competition_price from competitiondates natural join enroll natural join DateInscription where competition_id=@ID and athlete_dni=@DNI and date_inscription between initial_date and finish_date

data.name: SQL_INSERT_TIMES
data.value: insert into HasParticipated values (@COMPETITION_ID, @DNI, 0, @TIME)

data.name: SQL_SELECT_STATUS_ENROLL
data.value: select status from Enroll where ATHLETE_DNI = @dni AND COMPETITION_ID = @COMPETITION_ID

data.name: SQL_UPDATE_TIMES
data.value: update HasParticipated set INITIAL_TIME=0, FINISH_TIME=@TIME where COMPETITION_ID=@COMPETITION_ID AND ATHLETE_DNI=@DNI

data.name: SQL_INSERT_CATEGORY
data.value: insert into Category values (null,@CATEGORY_NAME, @CATEGORY_MIN_AGE,@CATEGORY_MAX_AGE,@GENDER)

data.name: SQL_INSERT_INSCRIPTION_DATE
data.value: insert into DateInscription values(@ID, @INITIAL_DATE, @FINISH_DATE)

data.name: SQL_ENROLL_ABSOLUTE_COMPETITION
data.value: insert into competitionCategory values (@COMPETITION_ID, @ABSOLUT_CATEGORY_ID)

data.name: SQL_ENROLL_COMPETITION_DATES
data.value: insert into competitionDates values (@COMPETITION_ID, @ID,@COMPETITION_PRICE)

data.name: SQL_ENROLL_REFUNDS_COMPETITION
data.value: insert into competitionRefund values (@COMPETITION_ID,@DATE_REFUND,@REFUND)

data.name: SQL_GET_ABSOLUTE_ID
data.value: select * from absolutcategories where name = @NAME and id_m = @ID_M and id_f = @ID_F

data.name: SQL_GET_COMPETITION_ID
data.value: SELECT * FROM COMPETITION WHERE COMPETITION_NAME =@COMPETITION_NAME and COMPETITION_DATE =@COMPETITION_DATE

data.name: SQL_INSERT_ABSOLUTE
data.value: insert into absolutCategories values (null, @NAME, @ID_M,@ID_F)

data.name: SQL_SELECT_CATEGORY_CHILD
data.value: SELECT * FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NAME =@CATEGORY_NAME AND CATEGORY_MIN_AGE =@CATEGORY_MIN_AGE AND CATEGORY_MAX_AGE =@CATEGORY_MAX_AGE AND GENDER =@GENDER

data.name: SQL_MAX_ID_DATES
data.value: SELECT MAX(DATE_ID) FROM DateInscription

data.name: SQL_FINISH_COMPETITION
data.value: UPDATE Competition SET COMPETITION_STATUS='FINISH' WHERE COMPETITION_ID = @COMPETITION_ID
